attributes.action:
Look into a policy for care homes during COVID 
So we visit.
attributes.background: Look into making a change to care home procedures during COVID so we can visit family in a safe environment

rejection.details:
The Government published guidance on 4th November to support safe home care visits under the national restrictions taking effect from 5th November:
https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-guidance-to-support-safe-care-home-visits-during-lockdown

You could start a petition calling for specific changes to be made to this guidance, if there are specific changes you'd like to see happen.
